content.raw: Any particular reason red was chosen? Changing the color is fine, it's just important to keep track of how many different colors start getting introduced. I suggest picking no more than 3 or 4 colors (from Material Design, to make it easier) that go together nicely, and make sure that those are the only colors used. If too many are introduced, the UI will start looking inconsistent.
